description:
Call, Email or Text with a single tap. Use LaunchPoint Speed Dial to create photo icons in your launcher for instant access to the people you contact most.

Assign each "launchpoint" to directly dial, email or message your contact; or choose a "pop-up" launchpoint, giving you the option of multiple contact methods.

"Auto-dial" combines the flexibility of a pop-up with single tap convenience. Drag a launchpoint to the quick-launch bar for easy access. 

LaunchPoint Speed Dial - there's no faster way to dial, email or text, period.

***** Version 0.9.5 fixes missing contact photo issues
